inputs: This is all happening on a fishing boat in northern Canada.
Gazi and Jasper watch on, bemused.
No one thought to bring a can opener with them.
Chris reminds everyone he's on a plant-based diet.
A hostile, carnivorous monkey attacks Chris shortly after this proclamation.
A swarm of rats emerges from the lower decks and start chipping the cans open.
Jordan throws a can at the monkey, scoring a direct hit.
The monkey faints and falls off a slightly chewed-on Chris. While this was happening, the rats opened all the cans and carried away the pet food.
Luckily, since northern Canada is basically a freezer, the expiration date had no effect, so the remaining food is edible, with plenty of plant-based options.
Chris and Jasper eat canned sauerkraut, while Jordan and Gazi cook up some monkey stew.
Our story begins in an empty grocery store, in the midst of a zombie apocalypse.
Gazi and Jasper return from frozen aisle, confirming that they have 2 remaining days of food rations.
There was not a can opener in sight.
Jordan shouts in excitement, he spots pack of perfectly packed Twinkies.
Everyone races towards the food, leading to Jasper being shoved to the ground.
Rats swarm out of nowhere and snatch the remaining Twinkies off the floor.
The group can only watch in terror as the final rat nibbles away at the last Twinky.
Out of the corner of her eyes, Gazi spots a crack in the floor. She inches forward and reveals a removeable floor tile.
Chris slowly lifts open the floor tile, revealing an entire storage of Twinkies boxes.
Everyone eats Twinkies, momentarily forgetting about the zombies clawing outside the door.
The snow continues falling, piling around the the cabin that Chris and Jordan find themselves trapped in.
Out of nowhere, Jasper climbs out of the chimney and Gazi walks out of a bedroom. They have been trapped as well.
Our newly formed group starts to panic, realizing that their food rations will not feed all 4 of them.
Instantly, Jordan leaps to horde the cans of food, convinced that expired pet food is better than no food.
Chris and Jasper get up and tackle Jordan, forcing him to hand over the cans.
Suddenly, Gazi shouts, realizing that a room in the house holds dozens of science fair inventions.
Within the inventions the group finds a flamethrower, the solution to their very dire problem.
Jordan prepares the flamethrower, understanding that this is the only way out.
Jasper opens the door, and as snow starts flooding in, Jordan starts up the flamethrower.
In seconds, the snow clears from the flames and paves a path towards freedom. The group walks out, leaving the cans of pet food behind.
Chris and Jordan stand in front of their kitchen table, determined to win their upcoming science fair with their canned food transformer.
Gazi and Jasper patiently sit across from them, excited to taste test what their friends' invention has made.
Jasper takes a can and opens it. He brings a spoonful of goo to his mouth.
Jasper screams. The food starts to turn him into a werewolf.
As if his body is moving on its own, the werewolf slashes at Jordan, causing a gash on Jordan's arm.
A rat falls from above.
The werewolf takes a look at the rat and reaches for it. He puts it in his mouth.
The werewolf howls as if ingesting the rat has caused it an immense amount of pain.
All of a sudden, the werewolf transforms back to Jasper's human form. It appears that eating a rat will reverse the effects of the werewolf transformation.
Chris and Jordan went on to win the upcoming science fair for presenting their new werewolf transformer.
